title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 21.5 - Amendments to radio-telephone utility certificates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 21.5 - Amendments to radio-telephone utility certificates

State Regulations

Whenever a radio-telephone utility proposes to make any
change which would alter its service contours, as authorized by its certificate
of public convenience and necessity, it shall petition the commission for an
amendment of said certificate. Said petition shall describe in detail the
proposed reliable service contour. The commission may act without hearing upon
petitions which it determines will have no significant impact upon the extent
of a radio-telephone utility's service territory. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
21.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
